content.text: Match ends, Espanyol 1, Villarreal 2.
Second Half ends, Espanyol 1, Villarreal 2.
Offside, Espanyol. Kiko Casilla tries a through ball, but Diego Colotto is caught offside.
Attempt missed. Sergio García (Espanyol) header from the centre of the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Fuentes with a cross.
Offside, Espanyol. Javi López tries a through ball, but David López is caught offside.
Gabriel (Villarreal) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Víctor Sánchez (Espanyol).
Penalty saved! Sergio García (Espanyol) fails to capitalise on this great opportunity,  right footed shot saved  in the bottom left corner.
Gabriel (Villarreal) is shown the yellow card for hand ball.
Penalty conceded by Gabriel (Villarreal) with a hand ball in the penalty area.
Offside, Villarreal. Mario Gaspar tries a through ball, but Ikechukwu Uche is caught offside.
Sergio Asenjo (Villarreal) is shown the yellow card.
Offside, Espanyol. Pizzi tries a through ball, but Diego Colotto is caught offside.
Foul by Gabriel (Villarreal).
Sergio García (Espanyol) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Manu Trigueros (Villarreal) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Víctor Sánchez (Espanyol).
Attempt saved. David López (Espanyol) header from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Diego Colotto with a headed pass.
Corner,  Espanyol. Conceded by Gabriel.
Ikechukwu Uche (Villarreal) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Ikechukwu Uche (Villarreal).
Víctor Sánchez (Espanyol) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Sergio García (Espanyol) wins a free kick on the right wing.

Foul by Ikechukwu Uche (Villarreal).
Héctor Moreno (Espanyol) is shown the yellow card.
Attempt missed. Héctor Moreno (Espanyol) left footed shot from the left side of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Jhon Córdoba.
Pizzi (Espanyol) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Nahuel Leiva (Villarreal).
Foul by Gabriel (Villarreal).
Jhon Córdoba (Espanyol) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Substitution, Espanyol. Álex Fernández replaces Cristhian Stuani.
Goal!  Espanyol 1, Villarreal 2. Jhon Córdoba (Espanyol) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Sergio García.
Offside, Villarreal. Nahuel Leiva tries a through ball, but Giovani dos Santos is caught offside.
Bojan Jokic (Villarreal) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Cristhian Stuani (Espanyol).
Substitution, Villarreal. Manu Trigueros replaces Moi Gómez because of an injury.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Moi Gómez (Villarreal) because of an injury.
Attempt missed. Fuentes (Espanyol) left footed shot from the left side of the box is close, but misses the top left corner. Assisted by Pizzi with a headed pass.
Foul by Moi Gómez (Villarreal).
Sergio García (Espanyol) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Corner,  Villarreal. Conceded by Javi López.
Attempt missed. Moi Gómez (Villarreal) right footed shot from the right side of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Ikechukwu Uche.
Substitution, Villarreal. Ikechukwu Uche replaces Jérémy Perbet.
Jérémy Perbet (Villarreal) wins a free kick on the right wing.

Foul by Tomás Pina (Villarreal).

Hand ball by Pizzi (Espanyol).
Cristhian Stuani (Espanyol) is shown the yellow card for hand ball.
Hand ball by Cristhian Stuani (Espanyol).
Corner,  Espanyol. Conceded by Bruno Soriano.
Attempt missed. Giovani dos Santos (Villarreal) left footed shot from the centre of the box is just a bit too high. Assisted by Nahuel Leiva.
Substitution, Villarreal. Chechu Dorado replaces Mateo Musacchio because of an injury.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Mateo Musacchio (Villarreal) because of an injury.
Goal!  Espanyol 0, Villarreal 2. Jérémy Perbet (Villarreal) right footed shot from very close range to the centre of the goal.

Hand ball by Nahuel Leiva (Villarreal).
Víctor Sánchez (Espanyol) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
